::Skulletron::

	Skulletron puts away his weapon and his anger flows away.

	"Aww.  And the fun was just starting too.  Oh well, if Zardus needs us,
then we must follow his orders directly," Skulletron says, helping
Bloodystrike up and walking away to see Zardus.
